scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:services: cd services && for dir in */; do cd "$dir" && npm install && cd ..; done
scripts.install:apps: cd apps && for dir in */; do cd "$dir" && npm install && cd ..; done
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix services/api-gateway" "npm run dev --prefix services/auth-service" "npm run dev --prefix services/business-logic-service" "npm run dev --prefix services/payment-service" "npm run dev --prefix services/webhook-listener-service" "npm run dev --prefix services/notification-service" "npm run dev --prefix services/fraud-service" "npm run dev --prefix services/audit-service"
scripts.dev:apps: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix apps/buyer-app" "npm run dev --prefix apps/seller-app" "npm run dev --prefix apps/admin-dashboard"
scripts.security:check: npm run security:audit && npm run security:outdated
scripts.security:scan: npm run security:audit && npm run security:outdated && npm run security:snyk
scripts.security:snyk: snyk test --all-projects || echo 'Snyk not installed. Run: npm install -g snyk && snyk auth'
